title: EP32: Love&HipHop Feat Marcus Black
itunes:title: EP32: Love&HipHop Feat Marcus Black
description:
This week the duo are joined by Marcus Black of Love&Hip Hop Hollywood. This week the discussions go left when Mandii inquires about Marcus' relationships on the show w/ Brooke Valentine and the "paralegal", why men choose to deal with multiple women, and the table is shaken when interracial dating is brought up in terms of Weezy's decision to date white men over black. Follow Marcus Black on Instagram @Mvrcusblvck If you liked the music at the beginning of this episode search Marcus Black on iTunes Love&HipHop airs on Mondays on VH1

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
